name: orderkuota-info
title: Get Account Info
description: Retrieves the details of your currently logged-in account.

parameters.name: username
parameters.label: Username (from login session)
parameters.placeholder: Your username after a successful login

parameters.name: authToken
parameters.label: Auth Token (from login session)
parameters.placeholder: The token you received after login

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/orderkuota-info \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username":"your_username","authToken":"YOUR_SESSION_TOKEN_FROM_LOGIN"}'
